CustomField.description: Despite Venue_Address__c exposes ParenHost address, there exists a validation rule Selection_parent_host_venue_rule that prevents filling ParenHost if venue is filled. So NOT(ISBLANK(Venue__c)) will exclude private information.
CustomField.formula: Additional_Information__c & IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Venue__c)),Venue__c <> Course__r.Main_Venue__c), BR() & "This session will be held at" & BR() & Venue_Address__c, "" )
CustomField.label: Notes
